metadata.title: CVE-2021-46977 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:KVM: VMX: Disable preemption when probing user return MSRsDisable preemption when probing a user return MSR via RDSMR/WRMSR.  Ifthe MSR holds a different value per logical CPU, the WRMSR could corruptthe host's value if KVM is preempted between the RDMSR and WRMSR, andthen rescheduled on a different CPU.Opportunistically land the helper in common x86, SVM will use the helperin a future commit.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
